words.name: phosphenes
words.definition: the colors or 'stars' you see when you rub your eyes

words.name: sonder
words.definition: the realization that each passerby has a life as vivid and complex as your own

words.name: petrichor
words.definition: the pleasant smell of earth after rain

words.name: wanderlust
words.definition: a strong desire to travel and explore the world

words.name: serendipity
words.definition: the occurrence of happy or beneficial events by chance

words.name: melancholy
words.definition: a feeling of pensive sadness, typically with no obvious cause

words.name: nostalgia
words.definition: a sentimental longing for the past

words.name: euphoria
words.definition: a feeling of intense excitement and happiness

words.name: reverie
words.definition: a state of being pleasantly lost in one's thoughts

words.name: ephemeral
words.definition: lasting for a very short time; fleeting

words.name: luminous
words.definition: full of or shedding light; bright or shining

words.name: ethereal
words.definition: extremely delicate and light in a way that seems too perfect for this world

words.name: catharsis
words.definition: the process of releasing strong or repressed emotions

words.name: resilience
words.definition: the capacity to recover quickly from difficulties; toughness

words.name: empathy
words.definition: the ability to understand and share the feelings of another

words.name: whimsy
words.definition: playfully quaint or fanciful behavior or humor

words.name: solitude
words.definition: the state of being alone without being lonely

words.name: wonder
words.definition: a feeling of amazement and admiration, caused by something beautiful

words.name: grace
words.definition: simple elegance or refinement of movement

words.name: tranquility
words.definition: the quality or state of being calm and peaceful

words.name: passion
words.definition: strong and barely controllable emotion

words.name: vulnerability
words.definition: the quality of being easily hurt or attacked; openness

words.name: authenticity
words.definition: the quality of being genuine or real

words.name: intimacy
words.definition: close familiarity or friendship; closeness

words.name: bliss
words.definition: perfect happiness; great joy

words.name: yearning
words.definition: a feeling of intense longing for something

words.name: revelry
words.definition: lively and noisy festivities, especially when these involve drinking

words.name: camaraderie
words.definition: mutual trust and friendship among people who spend a lot of time together

words.name: whisper
words.definition: a soft or confidential tone of voice; a rumor

words.name: embrace
words.definition: an act of holding someone closely in one's arms

words.name: laughter
words.definition: the action or sound of laughing

words.name: sparkle
words.definition: a glittering flash of light; liveliness and vivacity

words.name: gentleness
words.definition: the quality of being kind, tender, or mild-mannered

words.name: curiosity
words.definition: a strong desire to know or learn something

words.name: gratitude
words.definition: the quality of being thankful; readiness to show appreciation

words.name: warmth
words.definition: the quality, state, or sensation of being warm; friendliness

words.name: freedom
words.definition: the power or right to act, speak, or think as one wants

words.name: harmony
words.definition: the combination of different musical notes sounded together; agreement

words.name: adventure
words.definition: an unusual and exciting or daring experience

words.name: tenderness
words.definition: gentleness and kindness; softness

words.name: radiance
words.definition: light or heat as emitted or reflected by something; great happiness

words.name: playfulness
words.definition: the quality of being light-hearted or full of fun

words.name: belonging
words.definition: an affinity for a place or situation; fitting in

words.name: magic
words.definition: the power of apparently influencing events by using mysterious forces

words.name: wholeness
words.definition: the state of forming a complete and harmonious whole; integrity
